lines.text: You know what they do to killer clowns?... They send them to the funny farm.

[Explaining what exactly their moto is]
... keep the customers coming!
No extra business.
Who could be calling at this hour?
It's time for Bobo!

[strangling someone]
Don't call me, I'll call you.

[fatally using a bat]
You're out!
Nobody does nipples like Bobo.
[at the motel crime scene]
Go back to bed, Meyers. This isn't your guy.
How do you know?
Different M.O. The killer whipped up a little body still in the tub. And the lady... was a prostitute. Definitely the work of my psycho.
I'm just gonna snoop around a little.
Now, just wait a minute!
You don't mind, do you?
As a matter of fact... I do.
Good.
[to himself as he walks away]
That stupid schmuck is so fat that couldn't find his own pecker in his front pants pocket.
Look at that guy... he probably gets more ass than a toilet seat
